stimulusHtml: Some scholars believe that Francisco de Goya did not publish his series Los Desastres de la Guerra (The Disasters of War) during his lifetime because he believed that the response would have been
choicesHtml: disgust over his attempts to profit from the war through sales of his prints
cries for his demotion from French court painter to common printmaker
horror over the aggressive nationalistic sentiments he displayed in the work
persecution because he depicted atrocities committed by individuals on both sides of the conflict
